title: 17: Episode 16
itunes:title: Episode 16
description:
On our November 20th, 2005 edition of MuggleCast…

The guys discuss Goblet of Fire. Join Ben, Andrew, Kevin, Eric and Micah on this week’s edition of MuggleCast.

  • MuggleCast finally gets the plug on iTunes!
  • The group spends a few minutes reminiscing about the fun we had in NYC
  • Andrew and Joe Fulton from MillionairePlayboy.com reveal the two Lego contest winners
  • We provide complete Goblet of Fire coverage
  • So much coverage that we can’t even list it here
  • OOTP is also right around the corner, so what can we expect?
  • David Yates as the director of the fifth movie: is he a good choice?
  • Book Reviews update
  • Spy on Spartz
  • Andrew’s Listener Challenge (Note: Andrew is now responsible for any federal consequences involved in this task)
  • Thanks to Kelly for creating this picture of Micah taking a break from transcribing and this picture of the MuggleCasters podcasting at Barnes & Noble
itunes:author: Harry Potter
dc:creator: Harry Potter
